Intergalactic Appreciation Day - This holiday would celebrate the wonders of the universe, encouraging people to look up at the stars and appreciate the vastness of space. On this day, people could participate in stargazing events, learn about different celestial bodies, and engage in intergalactic-themed activities such as making alien crafts or cooking space-inspired recipes.

World Kindness Week - This holiday would focus on promoting acts of kindness and compassion towards others. People could participate by doing small acts of kindness for strangers, volunteering in their communities, or simply being more mindful of the impact their actions have on those around them.

International Hug Day - This holiday would encourage people to show affection and appreciation for one another through hugs. On this day, people could participate in hugging events, share hugs with friends and family, or simply embrace the people around them.

Earth Day Extravaganza - This holiday would celebrate the beauty and diversity of the natural world, while also raising awareness about environmental issues. People could participate by cleaning up local parks, planting trees, or engaging in other eco-friendly activities.

Cultural Exchange Day - This holiday would encourage people to learn about and appreciate different cultures from around the world. People could participate by attending cultural events, trying new foods, or engaging in activities that promote cross-cultural understanding and exchange.
